name: Astra and Zap in... Dr. Outage's ContrapShip!
name_original: Astra and Zap in... Dr. Outage's ContrapShip!
description:
presented by Jigubigus Affiliates

In this quick wits puzzler, you use your friendly electricity eating lizard, Zap, to traverse the evil Dr. Outage's ContrapShip. To get out, you must traverse many rooms and electrify those lightbulbs with rays of pure and fiery eletric goodness.

So go eat batteries, shoot and connect some energy blasts and try to escape the grasp of Dr. Outage!

Controls: 
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • E - Pick Up
  • R - Restart

( This game was deveped in the Level Up Game Jam by ISEP, with the intent of creating a game with and unconventional weapon, our little buddy Zap :D )
